page.title: 06LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: The most popular activity for the people around Pulloxhill is gardening.There is a Gardening Club with about 12 regular members.The flowers and vegetables always look very flourishing as you pass through the village. Reading and knitting are the next most popular pursuits and swimming and walking are also enjoyed. The list of hobbies we collected in our survey included bodybuilding,cricket,car/motorbike and home maintenance,caravanning,cooking, bird-watching,theatre going,playing bridge,sailing,shooting and game-keeping,doing crosswords,singing, painting,spinning and weaving.
